meanings.definition: A remarkable concurrence of events or circumstances without apparent causal connection.
meanings.sent1: The series of coincidences that led to their meeting was truly unbelievable.
meanings.sent2: I always find it fascinating how coincidences can bring people together.
meanings.sent3: The string of coincidences that day made everyone laugh at the sheer randomness of it all.
meanings.sent4: The coincidences in their lives seemed to paint a picture of fate at work.
meanings.sent5: The coincidences piled up, creating a mosaic of unexpected connections.

meanings.definition: A striking occurrence of two or more events at one time apparently by mere chance.
meanings.sent1: The coincidences of finding two identical flowers blooming side by side amazed me.
meanings.sent2: It was just a series of coincidences that led to them crossing paths that day.
meanings.sent3: The coincidences of running into each other at the same place every week started to feel like a comedy routine.
meanings.sent4: The coincidences of their lives intertwining felt like a dance orchestrated by fate.
meanings.sent5: The coincidences seemed to dance around them, creating a sense of magic in the air.
